name: empty-downloads-folder
title: Empty downloads folder
description: Moves the contents of your Downloads folder to the Recycle Bin

commands.name: empty-downloads-folder
commands.title: Empty downloads folder
commands.description: Moves the contents of your downloads folder to the recycle bin
commands.subtitle: Trash it

preferences.name: folderPath
preferences.title: Folder path
preferences.description: Folder whose contents will be moved to the Recycle Bin

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: owendavidprice
